name: Enter the Void to the Holy Mountain
description: A trans-dimensional life form explores the universe. Through the enormous amount of knowledge it accumulates, it doubts its own existence. Fleeing the intensifying feeling of loneliness, it gets lost on Earth. In the process, it penetrates deep into the consciousness of a civilisation that is helplessly overwhelmed by its own permanently changing reality and its technical developments. One day, the life form plays the 5-dimensional game "Bullets are round so their thoughts can change direction.", and an idea emerges that changes everything.

name: Verticality
description:
Samus finds herself on a very strange planet and must get out.
Verticality is a full-hack with new mechanics, enemies, items, and more.
Contains subtly remixed vanilla music.

name: The Jingol
description: The teachings of his excellency: Jingol.

name: Spear of Destiny Super CD Pack
description: Sin descripción

name: Wolfenstein 3D
description: A bundle containing Wolfenstein 3D along with Spear of Destiny and its extra episodes.

name: Dark and Darker Mobile
description: Dark and Darker Mobile is a Fantasy Extraction RPG. Players will embark on a daring journey in this PvPvE experience where they will vanquish cunning adventurers and monsters while exploring dungeons consumed by an encroaching darkness. As players delve deeper, treasures hidden within the shadows will promise unparalleled wealth and power, waiting for the bravest souls to claim their riches.

name: Pikes.io
description:
Ride your horse and get your spear ready. It's time to join a jousting tournament! Challenge other brave knights in this classic and win the ladies' favors.
Join thousands of players in Pikes.io! Collect rainbow dots while trying to defeat your enemies. Control a knight with a pike or a spear and attack your enemies -- you can defeat them with a single blow, so move as fast as possible! The more dots you collect, the faster you become, and the bigger your pike... Can you take over this arena?

name: Dead Rising Deluxe Remaster
description: Dead Rising returns with modern graphics! More than just a remaster, this Deluxe Remaster is a full graphical overhaul of the first game in zombie-slaughtering action game series "Dead Rising." This remaster has also been fully voiced, supports auto-saves, and has various other quality-of-life features. Witness the unmatched mayhem and freedom for yourself!

name: Aero Fighters
description: The SNES port of Aero Fighters is one of the rarest standard North American releases, produced in very limited quanitities.

name: Spear of Destiny
description: A bundle with Spear of Destiny and its Mission Packs was released on GOG.com and Steam under the name of "Spear of Destiny" by id Software. Due to Bethesda merging Wolfenstein 3D and Spear of Destiny into a single bundle, this bundle with the mission packs got delisted, which means that the packs are unavailable for new buyers.

name: Wolfenstein 3D
description: The current version of Wolfenstein 3D for digital platforms include Wolfenstein 3D (a port of the expanded DOS version, with all of the six episodes) and the standalone expansion Spear of Destiny (without its extra missions).

name: Popgoes Arcade: Fighting Chance
description: "Fighting Chance" is an upcoming FREE major update for POPGOES Arcade on Steam. My final attempt at perfecting the original vision for the game, giving those who enjoyed the game a reason to play it again, and those who didn't enjoy it a reason to give it another try.

name: Wolfenstein 3D
description: A port for web browsers of Wolfenstein 3D. It contains only the original 3 levels of the DOS version.

name: Wolfenstein 3D
description: The 3DO port of Wolfenstein 3D is based on the full Macintosh version.

name: Hammerin' Harry: Collector's Edition
description: Ported to the home console a year after the original arcade, 大工の源さん (Daiku no Gen-san) would feature much of the arcades content - although a bit less brutal. A version was released in Europe under the name Hammerin' Harry which would replace certain Japanese cultural staples from the game such as ramen shops becoming pasta shops as well as some items.

name: Hammerin' Harry 2: Dan the Red Strikes Back - Collector's Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Hammerin' Harry: Concrete Collection
description: The Hammerin’ Harry Concrete Collection brings the first two titles together which stars one of Irem’s most recognizable characters - Harry! Our heroic carpenter stars in Hammerin’ Harry and Hammerin’ Harry 2: Dan the Red Strikes Back

name: Akron
description: Sin descripción

name: There's No Monsters
description: Have you checked under the bed? Or in the closet? We guarantee there's no monsters there!

name: The Alchemist
description: Sin descripción

name: I Commissioned Some Bunnies 10
description: I paid artists to hide bunnies and carrots in 15 artworks. Can you find them all? Warning: Relaxing.

name: RoboGal: Gaga Delta Lady
description: Rei-Bo was living peacefully on the island of Plutobell, until a giant spaceship crashed into the place! This is a fun and humorous saga to solve this incident full of obstacles and traps! Choose the levels in the order you want, defeat the ship's members and get their weapons in RoboGal!

name: Alex the Allegator 2
description: Sin descripción

name: Kitty Rhythm TD
description:
Welcome to the fair!
Help the cats to cheer up with music so the ball will be a success!
In this game, the song’s beat dictates when every move will happen.

name: A Mask's Tale
description: A Mask’s Tale is an investigation and suspense game that takes place in an alternative version of the city of São Paulo. In this dystopian reality, people are forced to wear masks, hiding their faces and identities.

name: Cursor & Meow
description: In Cursor & Meow, many cats crave your attention, but not all of them will be easy to catch. To find some of them, you'll need to use a lot of concentration, dexterity, and logic! The game features numerous puzzles, challenges, and mini-games that will make your search entertaining and varied.

name: CorActio
description: CorActio is a 2D platformer with puzzle elements set in an alternate, polluted version of our world. Developed by the indie studio Delusional Ram, this game immerses players in a mission to cleanse the environment from the relentless industrial pollution.

name: DeathRoll
description: DeathRoll is a horror strategy game inspired by games such as Buckshot Roulette, Inscryption, and Balatro. Play as a damned soul that must save itself from the grips of the monsters in the underworld.

name: Beach Bums
description: Beach Bums is a cheeky 2D hidden object memory game in which the player must reunite beachgoers with their swimsuits after a tidal wave washes them away.

name: A Dark Place 2
description: Sin descripción

name: Wolfenstein 3D Classic
description: Sin descripción

name: Garuya and the Kaleidoscope of Syzygy
description:
"During the night, monster ruins are rising from the skies, ancient prophecies speak of a new syzygy."

An epic platform RPG where you play as a wizard named Garuya who wants to investigate the strange return of ruins from a distant past that are appearing throughout the land of Foltabur.

name: Fallout 76: Season 4 - Cold Steel
description:
Cold Steel is a board game based on the fictional cartoon adventures of Armor Ace and his companions, the Power Patrol. It was created and published by Dynamite Animation Company.

In the wake of the American "liberation" of the Yukon Territory, a damaged Assaultron uploads its consciousness into a suit of T-45 power armor and is reborn as Commissioner Chaos. The rogue A.I. forms the Yukon Five, a group of anti-imperialist robots which threaten to halt the march of Manifest Destiny.

name: Fallout 76: Season 5 - Escape from the 42nd Century
description: Escape from the 42nd Century was the fifth season in Fallout 76. It began on July 7, 2021, with the release of the Steel Reign update. It follows Armor Ace and the Power Patrol in Cold Steel and was followed by The Unstoppables! vs The Diabolicals.

name: Fallout 76: Season 6 - The Unstoppables! vs The Diabolicals
description: The Unstoppables! vs The Diabolicals was the sixth season in Fallout 76. It began on September 8, 2021, with the release of the Fallout Worlds update. It follows Escape from the 42nd Century and was followed by Zorbo's Revenge.

name: Fallout 76: Season 7 - Zorbo's Revenge
description: Zorbo's Revenge was the 7th season in Fallout 76. It began on December 8, 2021, with the release of the Night of the Moth update. It follows The Unstoppables! vs The Diabolicals and was followed by A Better Life Underground.

name: Fallout 76: Season 8 - A Better Life Underground
description: A Better Life Underground was the 8th season in Fallout 76. It began on March 1, 2022, with the release of the Invaders from Beyond update. It follows Zorbo's Revenge.

name: Raider's Saga
description:
Raiders Saga is the ultimate gaming experience of 2024, where chaos and beauty collide in a Cybernetic Anime Themed Viking Saga.
Engage in Seasonal Matchmaking to delve into the realms of PvP, PvE, and Raider Racing! Battle it out in PvP Arena Deathmatches and intense PvP Capture the Flag modes, showcasing your skills like never before.

Feel the itch for speed?
Join our Matchmaking Racing Odin’s Cup to satisfy your racing desires!

But wait, there's more!
Embark on epic adventures with friends through our PvE Matchmaking, conquering Dungeons and Raids as you strive to become the next(esports) legend.

Join Raiders Saga today and immerse yourself in a world where legends are born and epic tales unfold!

name: ECWolf
description:
ECWolf is an advanced source port for Wolfenstein 3D, Spear of Destiny, and Super 3D Noah's Ark based off of the Wolf4SDL code base. ECWolf pulls a substantial amount of code from ZDoom and aims to provide a wide array of mod editing capabilities without the need to modify the source code.

For players, ECWolf provides many useful features such as better control binding, support for wide screen resolutions, and unlimited save slots.

name: Monster Hunter Puzzles: Felyne Isles
description: Explore the world of Monster Hunter through a cast of cute Felyne characters while solving challenging puzzles!

name: Fragment
description:
Timothy Jenkins is an aspiring scientist in the field of experimental cybernetic psychology. He is a loner, working the days away in his tiny laboratory, mostly known to fellow scientists for the unconventional and daring character of his work - often conducted at the borders of the code of scientific practice. His most recent experimental setup, called the Plateaus of Oblivion, was intended to explore human memory and conditions of forgetting, remembering, grief and remorse - but somewhere along the way, in the heat of the moment, Timothy loses control of the situation.

An effervescent whirlwind of pure emotional code unfolds, and he soon finds himself confronted with memories from an uncertain past, with fears he had long forgotten and suppressed - and with love, where he least expects it. Can he, a man who has long lost track of the world, handle this digital emotion overload?

name: Undertale: Promised.
description: Undertale Promised. A fight against Sans but pretty early on in the story.

name: Kana Heroes
description: Kana Heroes is an educational game that helps you learn to recognize the symbols used in Katakana and Hiragana (collectively called "Kana"), the first two alphabet styles used in the Japanese language. With this knowledge, you'll be able to read words in Japanese.

name: Multiplayer Werewolves
description: Multiplayer Werewolves - You and Your Team are the last remaining Humans on Earth. Can You Survive ?

name: Wolfenstein 3D
description: Cancelled port of Wolfenstein 3D for the Sega Genesis.

name: Wolfenstein 3D
description: Unofficial port of Wolfenstein 3D for the Sega Genesis/Mega Drive.

name: KitBashers 2: Multiplayer
description: KitBashers 2 [Multiplayer] - Bad Dudes are attacking Planet KitKa. Queen Calica needs Your Help. The Kits are getting Bashed. You and Your team must take out ALL Aliens and Save the Planet.

name: Jet Fighters with Friends (Multiplayer)
description: Single Player OR Multiplayer Jet Fighter Game with OR without A.I. Bots.

name: Grokai
description: Grokai - An A.I. Generated Text Based "Choose Your Own Adventure" Game

name: Trepang2: Bladekisser DLC
description: Shoot and slice your way through enemies with the Trepang2 Bladekisser DLC. Embark on new missions in new areas, and engage in close, brutal combat with your sword. Are you worthy enough to wield the blade?

name: Brickgame
description: A TIC-80 port of some games from Brick Game consoles.

name: Pl¢tfarmer
description: Sin descripción

name: MechaBlade Hero
description: MechaBlade Hero is an indie action adventure game where you control a robot fighting your way through an army of robots to get out of a giant tower. Face enemies and gain new weapons, solve puzzles and platform challenges in this challenging hack and slash.

name: Star Wars: Bounty Hunter
description:
Experience the legendary Bounty Hunter fantasy set before the events of Star Wars: Episode II - Attack of the Clones. Face off against foes and maneuver through acrobatic battles in this adaption optimized for today's consoles and hardware.

Fight your way through the galaxy’s underbelly, equipped with Dual Blasters, your Flamethrower, Whipcord, and pure Mandalorian Rage.

name: Castle Come
description: Castle Come is a walking fortress roguelike. Scout a strange land full of bandits in search of new parts, defeat enemy castles and scavenge the wreckage, recruit crew to man your growing arsenal of weapons and build your way from an agile fortling into a deadly, hulking, monster machine.

name: Rarity
description:
slowly reassemble the new landscapes

Short little 3D, first person narrative game about life continuing after COVID and the weird time skip that occurred for people as their lives drastically changed in an ephemeral but 3 year time period.

Explores themes around University, friendships, the feeling of time passing and it being over before it's begun.

name: Angel Wings
description:
Explore the quiet dreams of Ame, a young girl unwilling to leave her bedroom.
A Yume Nikki fangame developed in six weeks for Dream Diary Jam 8.

name: Odeio Sonhar
description:
A Yume Nikki Fangame for Dream Diary Jam 8.

Play as Ivy, a young adult who comes to grapple with their own identity and family as they engross themselves in the world of a TV Show, simply titled, "Frank Show." Learn about yourself, change your body, and come to grips with the things that lay in the recess of your mind.

name: Lapis Lazuli
description: Lapis Lazuli is a Yume Nikki fangame for Dream Diary Jam 8, where you can explore the dreams of a young boy named Yasuo.

name: Camera
description: A Yume Nikki fangame for the Dream Diary Jam 8.

name: Yume Nikki Space
description: Madotsuki has dreamed so hard that she explored every corner of the dream world countless times... until Masada took Mado to a new space... a YUME NIKKI SPACE.

name: DNA Subject: Lucy
description: DNA Subject: Lucy is a Yume Nikki fangame where you explore the dreams of Lucy, a young girl who isolates herself from the rest of the world. An entry for Dream Diary Jam 8.

name: Break a Leg
description: Break a Leg is a series done over YouTube shorts where the top comment got the next addition to the game. Break a Leg is a game where your primary goal is to break your leg. Once you do, you did it. You won. Therefore, there's no more reason to keep playing this game.

name: Mother Restored
description:
MOTHER Restored is a patch for EarthBound Beginnings that aims to make it as faithful as possible to the Japanese version of MOTHER while keeping its gameplay improvements.

In this patch:

The game’s script has been completely replaced with the more accurate translation done by Tomato for MOTHER1+2, including dialogue, battle text, item and enemy descriptions, and other miscellaneous text. Unlike previous attempts to replace EarthBound Beginnings’ dialogue, this patch repoints virtually all of the text in the game. This allowed the fan translation to be included in its entirety. The main version also makes names of characters, locations, and items more accurate to what they were originally.

name: A.IV Evolution: Hatsubai Kinen Gentei Set
description: This is a special edition of A.IV Evolution for the PS1 that came with a mouse, mousepad & memory card. This most likely came as a result of A.IV Evolution being at the PS1's launch, and may have been the first game with these accessories.

name: Smol Survivors
description: Smol Survivors is a 2D reverse bullet-hell where you open portals to new worlds and then fight off hordes of hostile inhabitants. Collect weapons, upgrade them, then combine them into super weapons to wreak havoc!

name: SWAT
description: Aliens try to build a tunnel from their vessel to your home base to infiltrate you. Your task is to prevent them from doing so.

name: DJMax Respect V: V Liberty Pack
description: DJMAX RESPECT V - V LIBERTY PACK!! Meet the 'V Original Music' package now!

name: Payday 3: Boys In Blue - Chapter 2
description:
Chapter 2 - Boys in Blue is the second DLC as part of the Silver & Gold editions.
This chapter contains:
The Boys in Blue Heist
The Boys in Blue Tailor Pack
The Boys in Blue Weapon Pack

What would you do if some corrupt cops raided your completely legitimate business, planted some evidence, and showed every sign of wanting to keep the gold they “confiscated”? Well, in Vlad’s case, he got in touch with his old friends in the Payday Gang to enact revenge and get his damn gold back.
The Boys in Blue Heist tasks the gang with breaking into a secure holding facility of the NYPD on Vlad’s behalf. He wants his gold back, and the gang has never let him down before.

name: Tom and Jerry: Frantic Antics!
description: Sin descripción

name: Race Drivin'
description:
SNES Port of "Race Drivin'"

Here it is... the amazing conversion of the smash arcade sensation brings screaming-fast car racing to your home! Pound the pedal and grind those gears, down the straights and around wicked hairpin turns. Whip through hairy S-curves, gut-flipping loop-the-loops and crazy corkscrews! With three cars to choose from, multiple music tracks and cool sound effects, Race Drivin' brings arcade-style auto speed competition right to you!

name: Race Drivin'
description: Game Boy Port of "Race Drivin'".

name: Iron Man and X-O Manowar in Heavy Metal
description: Iron Man/X-O Manowar in Heavy Metal is a Sega Game Gear action beat-'em-up game developed by Realtime Associates and published by Acclaim Entertainment.

name: Bubsy II
description: Sin descripción

name: Tiny Tap Quest
description: Easy to play tapping RPG where you fight monsters and upgrade your character as much as you can.

name: The Sims 4: Lovestruck
description: Explore romance as you match with alluring Sims and plan exciting dates in The Sims 4 Lovestruck Expansion Pack.

name: Macis
description: Macis is a platform game focused on exploration. In this game, you control a young Chia in a search for her parents, who mysteriously disappeared when she was a child. Your main suspect? The one responsible for security in the city where she lives. Finding her parents seems like an impossible challenge, but alongside her team of bounty hunters, she is confident that she can finally find out what happened.

name: Kuroi Mishin: Sekaikei Girl
description: Horror-themed homebrew platform game for the MSX, consisting of 42 screens with pattern-based enemies.

name: The Restless Sheep & The Lone Wolf: A Tale of Cutthroat Lovers
description: In this twisted love story of a visual novel by CLOCKUP, an insomniac must decide whether to protect his position as a yakuza bigwig’s pet killer or the mysterious woman who can put him to sleep.

name: Cool World
description: Sin descripción

name: Cool World
description: NES Port of "Cool World".

name: Mickey's Ultimate Challenge
description: Sin descripción

name: Runner Bear
description: Auto-running homebrew platform game for Atari 8-bit computers.

name: Clickolding
description: The man in the corner of your hotel room wants you to click something. He wants to watch you click it.

name: Mickey's Ultimate Challenge
description: Sin descripción

name: Gauntlet II
description: A handheld port of the classic arcade dungeon crawler Gauntlet II.

name: Street Racer
description: Sin descripción

name: Indiana Jones and the Last Crusade: The Action Game
description:
The Game Boy port of The Last Crusade.

A two-fisted action game from the people who brought you the smash hit movie.

The chase is on...all the way to the greatest treasure in history, the Holy Grail. And if you can survive the treacherous caves of Colorado...the medieval catacombs of Venice...the deadly ramparts of Schloss Brunwald...and the cunning traps of the Grail Temple...then you've earned your whip and your hat!

Whip those bad guys...as only Indy can! Relive the greatest action scenes from the greatest Indy movie of them all.

It's red hot, slam-bam action, Indiana Jones and LucasFilm style!

name: Star Wars
description: Sin descripción

name: Sokoban DS
description: Sokoban, the classic Japanese puzzle game, comes to your Nintendo DS offering you hours and hours of entertainment. Your objective is to push boxes (or balls) to their correct place through a small space full of obstacles.

name: Terminator 2: Judgment Day
description: Sin descripción

name: Cool Spot
description: Sin descripción

name: Cool Spot
description: Sin descripción

name: About Face
description: Sin descripción

name: Paperboy 2
description: Sin descripción

name: Paperboy 2
description: Sin descripción

name: Wilson: In Search of Tom
description: Sin descripción

name: Relic Abyss
description: Choose a class out of 20 adventurers and unearth powerful relics. Min-max your character's stats, upgrade your talents, and smith the most powerful weapons in this action survival roguelite RPG!

name: Yume Nikki Ware
description: WarioWare, but it's Yume Nikki!

name: The Pro Yakyuu Super '94
description:
The Pro Yakyū Super '94 is a follow-up to The Pro Yakyuu Super. With the exception of a new mode, different music, commentary, and slight interface changes, the gameplay is largely identical to that of the previous entry.

Rosters of the licensed professional Japanese baseball teams have been updated to the current season. The new mode is called "Home Run Contest"; the player controls a batter against a computer-controlled pitcher, trying to score a home run.

name: Hologram
description: Hologram is a sokoban type game with holograms.

name: Polis 2: Någon ljuger
description: Polis 2 is a Swedish game where you play as a leader of the murder investigation unit of the police force and the task is to solve a murder case which starts with the finding of a dismembered arm in a lake. The gameplay consists of you assigning team members tasks, interrogation, and collect evidence whereof lamps will indicate progress of how much has been collected. Once enough evidence is collected the player can eventually put together who the murderer is. The game was released with its own localization in Denmark under the title 'Mistænkt'. It also changed the case introduction a bit where instead it is a woman who washed ashore on the beach.

name: Polis
description:
Polis is a Swedish game where you play as a leader of the homicide investigation unit and the task is to solve a 3 different murder cases.

The gameplay consists of assigning team members to find evidence as well as conduct interrogations. Eventually you will have enough to put together who the murderer is.

After the initial release the game was re-released in three separate acts representing the 3 cases:
- Polis: Det röda fallet
- Polis: Det gula fallet
- Polis: Det blåa fallet

name: Minty Monkey
description: Minty and her friends embarked on an adventure to defeat the terrible King Krumpa and recover the fragments of the mystical jewel.

name: Flap Happy
description: Flap your wings off in the world's first 8 Bit Avian Roguelike Platformer! It’s you versus gravity, sharks, and more as you flap to dodge hazards, collect fruit, and land on platforms. Each stage has its own hazards, and the procedural randomization means you’ll always be flapping it in somewhere new!

name: Castle Quest
description: Sin descripción

name: Krusty's Fun House
description: Sin descripción

name: Krusty's Fun House
description: Sin descripción

name: Corecraft
description:
Corecraft is a innovative reinvention of the classical Shoot ‘Em Up Games. Fully physically simulated and sophisticated modular spacecrafts (Corecrafts). Every Level plays differently and has an evil endboss waiting for you at the end!

Build your own Corecraft (modular spacecraft) and blow you enemies in pieces! Find the best tactic to annihilate Corecrafts, made of up to hundrets of modules!

You decide if you want to build a small, agile but fragile fighter or a heavy tank. The possibilities are endless...

name: Eternal Escape: Castle of Shadows
description: This is a light puzzle game set in a vampire manor, inspired by the experience of playing the "Castlevania series" and combined with an understanding and reflection on vampire culture.

name: One Last Raid
description: An arena based roguelike action RPG where you play as a skeleton warrior, who fights waves of enemies with diverse abilities. Each run you create a unique build by selecting different skills on each level up and picking up loot from fallen enemies.

name: Krusty's Fun House
description: Sin descripción

name: Championship Pool
description: Sin descripción

name: K-Tora USA
description: 3D racing game with trucks and wireframe graphics. It includes three tracks and a CPU-controlled adversary.

name: Championship Pool
description: NES Port of "Championship Pool". The game is a straight-forward, virtual version of pool and includes several games: eight-ball, nine-ball, three-ball, ten-ball, fifteen-ball, straight pool (14.1 continuous), rotation, equal offense and speed pool. The player may play against the computer or up to seven other players using the same console using the "Party Pool" (multiplayer) option. Other gameplay modes include "Tournament" (single-player, computer opponents), "Freestyle" (players make up own game rules) and "Challenge" (single-player, shot practice).

name: Beavis and Butt-head
description: Game Boy Port of MTV's Beavis and Butt-head.

name: Beavis and Butt-head
description: Game Gear Port of MTVs Beavis and Butt-head

name: Nobunaga's Ambition
description: A port of the second game in the Nobunaga's Ambition series.

name: Attack on Mutation Station
description: A genre-hopping mystery about neon spaceships, alien plants, digital demigods, and the nature of reality.

name: Nobunaga's Ambition
description: Battle or diplomacy? Swords or sanctions? As the ruler of a warring state in the turbulent feudal period of Japanese history, your decisions will sway the course of a nation.

name: Raccoonwave
description: A game about a raccoon and self-worth.

name: Nobunaga no Yabou: Zenkoku-ban
description: Sin descripción

name: Mini Reaper
description: Mini Reaper is a short indie chaser-horror 3D platformer themed after retro game creepypasta and game emulation. The gameplay revolves around collecting souls in a mansion while avoiding the chasing monster.

name: Raccoon & Possum Just Want to Read a Book
description:
Pages on the wind.
One keyboard, two garbage pals:
Raccoon and Possum.

Avoid obstacles and collect the pages to unlock actual pages from an actual book you can actually read. Jump over things. Jump on things. Jump on your buddy. Jump on your buddy while your buddy is also jumping. Just don't jump in pits or on birds or on those good lads who're just having a snooze and shouldn't be woken.

Press H if you get stuck.
If you get really stuck, go to Read or Title to get a new level.

name: Nobunaga's Ambition
description: Sin descripción

name: Nobunaga's Ambition II
description: Sin descripción

name: Cambo: Webbed Fist
description:
There comes a time in every capybara's life when they must set peace aside and don the red headband of strength to become the Capybarbarian, protector of the waterways.

For Cambo, this is that time.

Use your webbed fists, foraging, and digging skills to defeat the invaders and reunite with Capybarbara. Keep fighting: In the end, either they die, or you do.

name: Nobunaga no Yabou: Sengoku Gunyuuden
description: Sin descripción

name: Raccoon Laundering
description: Based on keywords washing, raccoon, and tanuki leaf, using bipsi, a bitsy-like tool developed by candle.

name: Nobunaga no Yabou: Sengoku Gunyuuden
description: Sin descripción

name: Nobunaga's Ambition
description: Nobunaga's Ambition, the first of the series, was released in 1983. Players assume the mantle of either Nobunaga Oda or Shingen Takeda and strive to conquer the entire land (17 areas in the Kansai and central Japan region). They manage their country to make it rich, then prepare their military forces. These then attack and defeat surrounding Clans in battle.

name: Ragtag Heroes
description: Ragtag Heroes is a co-op rogue-lite deckbuilder for up to 3 players! Players craft their own deck, defeat powerful foes in strategic combat, collect rare cards and relics and save the realm together!

name: Tanuki No Tabi
description: Taunki No Tabi (Tanuki's Journey) is a top-down, action-adventure shooter developed in Singapore polytechnic by pyu pyu production. There are three clans living in harmony, the Tanuki, the Saru and the Kitsune. Each individual species has an unique ability blessed upon a selected few by the Gods. The blessings obtained helps the races to prosper and live together peacefully. You get to play as Kotarou, a Tanuki that seeks to grow stronger and rescue his sister from the Kitsune who became greedy for power. Explore the world and earn gifts from the gods scattered across the land!

name: Akirao: A Researcher Awakens
description:
In Akirao, you step into the shoes of a disoriented researcher who awakens on a mysterious train with no memory of how he got there. Your head throbs, and a sense of unease grips you as you struggle to piece together the events that led you to this unsettling place.

Dive into the depths of mystery as you navigate through the eerie experiments conducted on you. Can you complete your missions, uncover the truth, and find your way to freedom?

name: Tanuki Thief
description: Jump around as an agile tanuki and travel through the city to steal gold and treasure boxes.

name: Babylon X
description:
Alternative history of the Ancient World: Mesopotamia, 6000 BC. A technological revolution against the backdrop of an impending apocalypse.

Energy, gravity, and its connections with ancient magic were discovered, leading to technological advancements in Babylon and Egypt. At that point, the struggle for resources had begun.

A former prophet who is now a runaway slave and avenger joins forces with a young moon cult priestess to prevent the imminent construction of the Tower of Babel. Betrayed by all, he starts a new life and finds love in a world that is about to end.

name: Platinum White
description: You have less than 8 minutes to remember what you can. It won't be enough time to remember everything. Run around and explore a lonely landscape or sit in the same spot, waiting. The Platinum White will come either way.

name: Chucky: Slash & Dash
description: Run and collect items as Chucky or Tiffany from the Child's Play franchise.

name: Saints Row: Dead Island 2 - Cosmetic Pack
description:
HELL-A meets Weird West in this FREE cosmetic pack inspired by DEAD ISLAND 2!

Dress your Boss with items from reckless antihero Jacob and quick-witted athlete Amy. Apply shock and awe with a new blunt weapon, stagger with swagger with a new emote, and evoke bitey beachside memories with a new HQ collectible!

name: Sofie: The Echoes
description: Sofie: The Echoes is a third-person action-adventure game that immerses players in a story-driven experience. Explore diverse environments, solve challenging puzzles, and unravel the mysteries surrounding Sofie’s family.

name: Saints Row: Front to Back Cosmetic Pack
description: Half the citizens of Santo Ileso don’t know whether they’re coming or going, and neither will you with this marvellously multifaceted Cosmetic Pack celebrating the Weird Wild West! Don your hat, pull up your cowboy boots, and strap in to your custom Hollybird. Keep It Strange Santo!

name: Tan-Tan-Tanuki
description: Tan-Tan-Tanuki is a 2d platformer that I made to make it fun to learn about Yokai and to introduce people to the world of Yokai and Japanese folklore.

name: Unplagued
description: Play as plague doctors with your friends in this multiplayer co-op medieval horror! Purge the plague. Create the cure. Escape the mutated creatures. Make the queen proud.

name: Saints Row: Going Commando Cosmetic Pack
description: Steal in style with the Going Commando Cosmetic Pack. Get sneaky with a new Boss outfit and tactical weapon, and give those explosive heists a touch of class. You may be a criminal but you’re still a professional, right?!

name: Ace Attorney Investigations 2: Prosecutor's Gambit
description: Prosecutor's Gambit is the second of Edgeworth's solo outings. Featuring new characters and the new "Mind Chess" gameplay mechanic, this title also expands on the crime scene re-creation gameplay mechanic introduced in the first entry. With his right to investigate crimes stripped from him, Edgeworth is left wondering if he should continue to pursue the truth as a prosecutor or as a defense attorney. Just what will his ultimate answer be...?

name: Saints Row: Idols Anarchy Pack
description: Don the iconic digitized DJ Helmet to light up your enemies faces before smashing them unconscious with the Idols Twinkle Bat, all to the sound of broken glass, before speeding off on your stolen neon-illuminated Sandstorm Scrambler bike.

name: Helbreath
description: Sin descripción

name: Saints Row: Los Panteros American Muscle Bundle
description: Pummel your enemies in style with this customized heavy duty gear. Cruise round Santo Ileso on the blazing orange custom Panteros Motorocycle. If anyone dares to get in your way, hop offf and hit them hard with the 'El Lanzador' dual-handed high impact slugger.

name: Saints Row: Saints Criminal Customs
description: The Saints Criminal Customs includes two specially adorned bonus items; the elaborately styled Saints Custom Convertible and the equally signature Saints Custom Stab Jacket.

name: Saints Row: Chicken Dinner Cosmetic Pack
description: Everyone’s a winner with this calorie-tastic Cosmetic Pack celebrating one of Santo Ileso’s finest eateries. They say you are what you eat, so your Boss should feel right at home kitted out head-to-toe like the mascot of Ned’s Diner!

name: Saints Row: SteelSeries Cosmetic Pack
description: For Glory! Saints Row and SteelSeries have partnered up on this FREE cosmetic pack featuring an exclusive Saints Row headset and long sleeve t-shirt for your Boss.

name: Tanuki's Dream
description: Tanuki's Dream is a 2D top-down, arena-like dungeon crawler. Defeat enemies to appropiate their abilities and use them to your advantage! Fight your way through the kappa-infested swamp and find the hidden Tanuki village.

name: Nobunaga no Yabou: Bushou Fuuunroku
description: Sin descripción

name: Undertale Patience
description:
Welcome to UNDERTALE PATIENCE. In this RPG Fan-Prequel UNDERTALE, you control the first human who falls underground in the world of monsters.

the fan-game was canceled unfortunately because the creator passed away, Rest in peace.

name: Nobunaga no Yabou: Bushou Fuuunroku
description: Sin descripción

name: Cryptica
description: Cryptica is a narrative-based psychological horror game where the apocalypse is just the beginning. Explore the enigmatic lands of Antarctica and its surrounding areas while the world ends.

name: My Brick Breaker
description: Mobile brick breaker arcade game. No ads. One-time in-app purchase.

name: Tanuki Tales
description:
Oh no! The nut-collecting tanuki is far away from home and a dangerously curious girl has taken an interest!

Take part in a magical and whimsical adventure as you help the tanuki return home through 3 seperate worlds containing several obstacles and enemies hindering your path!

name: NPC Adventure
description: Play as Greg, a lowly shopkeeper, on a RPG adventure to do the knight’s job and defeat the evil King in this game made for the Game maker’s Toolkit Jam 2023.

name: Paw Patrol Academy
description: PAW Patrol Academy is an early childhood education mobile game based on the popular PAW Patrol franchise. It contains a collection of themed minigames, heroic missions based on episodes of the PAW Patrol television show, and video clips from the show.

name: Nobunaga no Yabou
description: Sin descripción

name: Procelio
description: Procelio is a multiplayer voxel-based vehicle builder and shooter. Create your chassis and combine movement parts, guns, and other functional utilities to create a remote-controlled war machine, then duke it out with others in the war tearing its way across the Martian frontier.

name: A2C: Ayry Seems to be Playtesting a 2D Runner Shooter from Cci
description: A 2D runner shmup(shoot-em up) where you may or may not save a nation by beating a game. Shoot and dodge bullets while you keep running and jumping! Enjoy a story where you play the game made by Cci while Ayry and Cci banter with each other(and talk about the world of Nosolute and game development)!

name: Nobunaga's Ambition: Tenshouki with Power Up Kit
description: Sin descripción

name: Grazers
description: Protect herds of grazers by hunting them.

name: Flammenwerfer
description:
It is a tribute to Contra and Metal Slug.

It is inspired by internet meme "Hans get ze Flammenwerfer"

name: Kur Tu Teci, Gailīti Manu?
description: "Kur tu teci, Gailīti manu?" is a Latvian folk song about a rooster and his daily duties. As a game it is a simple parkour platformer.

name: AMSCII Invasor
description:
A Basic locomotive Game for "Wild" category and out of contest for the AMSCII Compo 2024, in the spirit of basic small listing at Amstrad books and revue era.

1000 points to collect for Win and see the End Game Screen

name: One Million Checkboxes
description: An incremental browser game in which people can check and uncheck boxes on a public page.

name: Vaygren: Lustful Temptation
description: Vaygren: Lustful Temptation is an erotic visual novel with multiple routes and unlockables. The game features fully animated scenes and stunningly beautiful fantasy women. You’ll be meeting, flirting, frolicking, and fighting alongside these women in a high-stakes adventure.

name: Lost Phoenix
description:
In a world paralyzed by pandemic and unrest, a dark plot is being set into motion. A terrorist group known as the Absolvers, lead by the evil TALBOTT, are plotting to throw the city into chaos. The only ones who can stop them are a sword-wielding amnesiac named Isaac and a gun-toting femme fatale named Layla. Together, they must fight their way across the city to stop the Absolvers and resolve their own personal conflicts with the group.

Based on the award-winning indie actioner Lost Phoenix.

name: Silver Falls: Battle Fever - Galaxy Bound Curse
description:
An action beat em up game in the Silver Falls universe!

Play as Fred Hardluck in the world of Galaxy Bound Curse from the Nintendo GameBoy. Find a variety of weapons and defeat as many enemies as you can to earn a high score. Have YOU got... Battle Fever!?

name: Marvel's Spider-Man 2: New Game Plus Update
description: The critically acclaimed and “Game of the Year” nominee (The Game Awards) Marvel’s Spider-Man 2 has new features now available via free patch update, including New Game+, Mission Replay Mode, New Accessibility Features, New Suits and more!

name: Silver Falls Mini: Monsters In North Island
description:
A thrilling new horror game has launched for the Pokémon Mini console! As part of the Nintendo exclusive Silver Falls horror series, you can now take your adventure with you on the go, anywhere, anytime!

In Silver Falls MINI, manage a team of people just trying to get by with their lives. But watch out! Monsters have appeared on North Island. It is up to Wilma, a wise hunter, Bull, a burly lumberjack, Gold, a friend carpenter, Hogan, a lively electrician, and Oxa, a starry eyed dreamer, to defeat the monsters and make North Island safe again.

Manage your party members' stats by directing party members to do jobs. Look out! If they are in bad shape, they may fail. If they are happy and well fed, they'll do better at their jobs and even find useful items for battle!

name: Silver Falls: Galaxy Bound Curse
description: It's the late 90s, and one of the Silver Falls locals has just had his first son born! The locals are at the local bar partying when disaster strikes. A child has been kidnapped and it is up to the locals to rescue the kid and stop the kidnapper.

name: Silver Falls Miracle Makeout Mania
description:
NEW to the Silver Falls series is the first ever Get Drunk And Kiss Your Friends On The Lips Simulator! Exclusive to the Nintendo DS, Silver Falls Makeout Miracle Mania allows players to match up their favorite characters from the Silver Falls series and make them kiss on the lips by closing the Nintendo DS when the timing is right!

Manage your resources wisely! Drawing on the series' roots of Survival Horror, players will have to manage a limited budget to purchase drinks and food. But WATCH OUT! Some character match ups won't like kissing on tbe lips, and doing so would totally ruin the vibe. Use your resources such as drinks and sandwiches to avoid making a dive bar faux pas and making two bad matches make out.

Giving characters drinks will increase their Drunken Level. The higher a character's Drunken Level is, the easier it will be to maintain a good vibe. Drunken characters will earn Romance Points faster!

You will earn a ranking by how well you do before the bar closes. Earn money by attaining a higher RANK. Use the money to buy supplies you need to survive the tense social situation of getting drunk with friends and strangers at a mountain dive bar.

You can earn different Epilogues for A Rank and S Rank, and enjoy a bit more story.

Enjoy this thrilling new chapter in Silver Falls!

Happy April fools, everyone!

name: Sky Dust
description: Sky Dust is set in a cyberpunk universe, taking place in a future where society has collapsed following a global disaster, and the lines between morality and ethics have become blurred.

name: We Are Saved
description: "We Are Saved" is a short, free, first-person horror game. You are trapped alone in an underground factory rumored to be a site of cat abuse. While being pursued by the deranged inhabitant of the abandoned factory, your mission is to rescue the pitiful cats and aim for escape.

name: Nobunaga no Yabou Internet
description: Sin descripción

name: I Am Not Crazy
description: After losing his daughter and wife, he became depressed and tried to kill himself many times. While she was unconscious, her head hit something hard and she went into a vegetative state. He didn't know where he was. All he wanted was to be reunited with his wife and daughter. He tried everything for her. AND... "Our character is trying to kill himself in a vegetative state."

name: Nobunaga's Ambition: Soutenroku
description: Sin descripción

name: WW2: Bunker Simulator - Origins
description: Take control of the Wehrmacht officer, the original commander of the bunker, before the 101st Airborne Division took him out. Together with your subordinates try to stop the Allies Normandy offensive. The tables have turned!

name: Star Conflict: Yith’Mor - Starter Pack
description: This bundle includes:The basic configuration of the Ellydium command fighter “Yith'Mor”Ellydium command fighter weapon “Yith'Kin”Active module “Crystal booster”Additionally, the pilot receives:“Nate Gilmore” portrait“Ellydium corporation” sticker“Crystal DNA” sticker“Ellydium skull” sticker

name: Star Conflict: Yith’Mor - VIP Pack
description: This bundle includes:The basic configuration of the Ellydium command fighter “Yith'Mor”Ellydium command fighter weapon “Yith'Kin”Active module “Crystal booster”Modifier “Adaptive hull regenerator” R8-12 and R11-17Additionally, the pilot receives:“Nate Gilmore” portrait“Ellydium corporation” sticker“Crystal DNA” sticker“Ellydium skull” sti

name: Penultima
description: Mecha Anime Rivalry.

name: Dragon Ball: Sparking! Zero - Ultimate Edition
description:
DRAGON BALL: Sparking! ZERO takes the legendary gameplay of the Budokai Tenkaichi series and raises it to whole new levels. Learn and master an incredible roster of playable characters, each with signature abilities, transformations, and techniques. Unleash the fighting spirit within you and take the fight to arenas that crumble and react to your power as the battle rages on.
The Ultimate Edition includes:

DRAGON BALL: Sparking! ZERO base game disc
Collectible lenticular card with Ultimate Edition upgrade pack voucher
Season Pass - 3 Packs including Dragon Ball Super: SUPER HERO and Dragon Ball DAIMA content that contains more than 20 playable characters.
Season Pass Bonus - Summon Shenron and 3 Days Early Access to the 3 DLC Packs
3 Days Early Access
Ultimate Upgrade Pack - including the following in-game items:
Goku (Super) Costume with Power Pole
Emote Voice Set
2 player card backgrounds
1 customization item that increases a character's fighting ability
Ultimate Edition Bonus - Summon Super Shenron

name: Midnight Myths
description: A First Person Horror game where you play as a new hired park ranger doing simple park ranger tasks and observing wild life. Some wildlife being creatures from American Folklore.

name: Tales of Monsterland DX
description:
A village besieged by monsters, a mysterious tower and a broken rope bridge. Save the village by uncovering the origin of these creatures.

Run, jump and battle your way through a strange land, gaining powerful abilities to help you in your quest.

It’s non-stop action all the way to the end, and then maybe you can find your way home.

name: Lagaf': Les Aventures de Moktar: Vol 1 - La Zoubida
description:
A decent platform game that's identical to Titus' earlier The Fox: From Here for Marakech, except that you are now controlling Moktar, a plump Arabian adventurer similar to Nintendo's popular Mario.

Nothing is wrong with the game-- it just feels like a rehash of many different platform games that's been done before, and better. If you like The Fox or any other Titus' action games, you'll probably like this one. If you're looking for a creative platform games without repetitive levels, play Disney's or Infogrames' games instead.

name: Abrapalabra: La Magia de Aprender a Leer
description: The software Abrapalabra was designed for children between 6 to 11 years old to develop their skills of writing and reading. It is a complete software with 2 CDs full of interactive activities to develop these skills.

name: Never Really Alone
description: A stressful day is not always saved by a good night's sleep. A girl alone in her new foster home finds any excuse not to go to bed. A short horror RPG made for an alternative game development class at the University of Utah.

name: Glass Masquerade 3: Honeylines - Folks & Spirits
description: The "Folks & Spirits" puzzle set contains 10 new puzzles representing 2 new themes with 5 puzzles in each, respectively - FREE demo puzzles included!

name: Poly Plaza
description: An open world game where you need to invest to become the richest man in town.

name: Kain Cobra: Autogun Blaster
description: Kain Cobra: Autogun Blaster is a 2D rogue-lite fast-paced shooter that blends kawaii charm with neon fury where our lazy anti-hero fights a mysterious intergalactic alien invasion to save Planet Blue!

name: Wired Gambit
description: Cut wires and outsmart Smuggy in the high stakes game of Wired Gambit. Strategically use your items, manage your shields, and choose your cuts carefully to emerge victorious!

name: The Standard Model
description: The Standard Model is a narrative walking simulator/slice-of-life game set in different worlds throughout the multiverse. The player takes on the role of an undergraduate student that gets to explore and experience 5 different worlds on a quantum adventure.

name: Cherry's Joi
description: Meet Cherry, a fiery redhead with a big personality. She and her sisters want to help you have lots of fun. Cherry loves wearing hot outfits like corsets and swimsuits, and sometimes even a tough leather suit. Cherry is waiting to be your guide and give you all sorts of things to do. Every time you play, you'll have a new adventure with her. Can you follow her directions? Don't miss out on the chance to play Cherry's JOI.

name: Bat to the Heavens
description: A bat and your wit is all you need to surpass any obstacle! Climb and surpass the heavens, and discover the secrets across the valley in this challenging momentum - execution - puzzle game!

name: Endless Chase: Fate of Bolek
description: Endless Chase: Fate of Bolek is a real-time RPG with time travel elements seamlessly integrated into both gameplay and narrative. It features five distinct core loops that alternate, set across three Sci-fi Punk worlds. These core loops, combined with non-linear gameplay and MetroidVania elements, provide players with a sense of freedom, choice, and empowerment, ultimately enhancing replayability.

name: Mizuki and the Crimson Moon
description: Journey through a yokai-filled Japan in this 2D Action Platformer! Control Mizuki, a carefree and playful kitsune, as she investigates evil events happening around her village. Use her signature ability of teleportation to overcome obstacles and defeat enemies in this unique platformer adventure.

name: Gen.loss
description:
A Yume Nikki fangame made for Dream Diary Jam 8.

Control Yamitsuki as she wanders a melancholy dreamscape. Learn more about her past and deep-set fears.

name: Mooh
description: An adventure in space through a cow that was abducted and is trying to return home. Explore the planets, solve puzzles, save the mimosas and collect parts to improve the ship that will take Mooh back home.

name: Kooka Bonga
description: Kooka Bonga is a multi-event game which can be played solo or multiplayer (up to four people on a single PC). From the canopy garden kingdom that acts as the central hub, the events can be accessed. Each successful finished event unlocks a life-seed or a bonus level.

name: Nightmare Fuel
description: Elvira has violated her mother's main injunction 'not to mix alcohol with drugs' and is about to die at the underground techno rave. Well-built Pink Rabbit appears unexpectedly and makes a strange proposal (refusal is not accepted). Now, the girl must save the Pink Kingdom, taste cucumber pizza and, who knows, deal with the cockroaches in her mind.

name: LAIzy Picture Phone
description: LAIzy Picture Phone is an online multiplayer party game that combines the concept of a 'telephone game' with AI-generated drawings. Players write a prompt for an AI to generate an image, and the next player receives it and has to guess the phrase that created this image, which prompts generate another image, and so on.

name: Rusts of Corruption
description: You've mysteriously awoken on an isolated island on an unknown world. A corrupting force spreads through the island, leaving only a short amount of time to learn about the islands mysteries... Who will you meet? What will you learn? Are you ready to see the world die?

name: Purple Prose for Purple Hearts: **** the Witch
description:
Meet Lucia. You're probably wondering how she-

okay, okay - you're probably not wondering that. She certainly is though; she tends to do it far too much. Today, she's had a funny idea: it includes, among other things, capturing a person in a pretty consensual, laidback, entirely safe manner to have a drawn out conversation about, like...God, the moral bankruptcy of 1900s psychological studies...anime maybe?

If that sounds trite on its face, well, perhaps it is. What ensues though is an event unheard of on the Last World, the world located most closely to the end of the universe and the last one we are ever likely to get in this lifetime. It is a leisurely trip through a maze with jagged edges. It becomes a commentary upon commentary as commentators gather to gawk and speculate about a series of events no one can really firmly understand.

And what the hey: you stick around after the end, we got romance, thrills, chills, and things it would be impolitic to talk about as a lead-in to an adventure through comforting environs with a witch and her agenda.

name: To Kill a God
description: An immersive action roguelite experience with a groundbreaking skill system that allows you to craft your own skill tree. unlock the true potential of your character, delivering an ever-evolving experience.

name: If you touch me, I will marry you.
description: “If you touch me, I will marry you.” is an escape room tag game where you can move your character to avoid obstacles and enjoy mini games.

name: UniqKiller
description: An upcoming multiplayer top-down shooter for mobile devices and PC.

name: The Choicer Voicer
description: Use your own voice to match voice clips in a gameshow format. Many customizable options, including the ability to add any audio desired.

name: Sonic Exe One More Time
description: Created by Mr Pixel Productions, One More Time is a new, more graphic take on the original Sonic.EXE creepypasta.

name: Sonic Exe One More Round
description: An improved version of Mr Pixel's "Sonic Exe One More Time", featuring new art and content.

name: Sonic.EXE One Last Round
description: This is a total rework of the original "Sonic.exe One Last Round" game, where the story about Sonic OMT will end, it should be noted that One Last Round Rework will be a kind of "reboot" where everything seen before will be tried, but in the best way

name: Pigebomb
description: Imagine a world similar to ours, where various animals are the dominant beings. It is in this place that we follow the story of Peck, the top operative of P.O.W.E.R., a worldwide agency that is fighting the nefarious plans of P.E.S.T. This independent terrorist group plans to bring chaos to society. The two groups are vying to take over a superweapon, the eggbomb. Peck's mission is to prevent the PEST agents from obtaining this new weapon, in a story full of references to classic spy films.

name: O Conto de Ada
description: O Conto de Ada is a textual mobile game, based on an original science-fiction story, where your choices define your paths within the game. Through an immersive narrative and soundtrack, you take on the role of Ada, an aerospace engineer responsible for researching and terraforming planets. His companions on this mission are Iatso, a monitoring artificial intelligence, and Azazel, a grumpy diary robot. In this context you will embark on an interplanetary space exploration knowing more about yourself and the universe from the choices you make.

name: Pizzapocalypse
description: Pizzapocalypse is a cartoony 3D platformer where pizza is key to your movement. Dash, Bounce and Stomp your way to your loyal customers!

name: 6 ft Blunder
description:
A white boy travels a bizzare world in search of granting a loved one a new body, as their loved one's race only lives in a temporary body until they become of age.

What lies at the end of their journey is a truth that was once forgotten.

name: Survivania
description: Survivania is a 2D Score Attack game where you fight hoards of the Demon Lords minions until you inevitebly meet your end. Keep your Combo high and Score high!

name: XCOM: Enemy Within - Commander Edition
description: Once upon a time XCOM: Enemy Within was going to be a simple add-on pack for Enemy Unknown, but it ended up adding so much to the core game that 2K opted to release it as part of a bundle that includes the main game and all the previous DLC. Enemy Unknown takes place on a modern Earth, under attack from an alien invasion.

name: Blood of Vladula Jr.
description: Blood of Vladula Jr. is a 2D platformer inspired by the platformers on the Nintendo Game Boy system. Jump, run, bonk monsters on the head, and turn into a bat, through 8 different levels, including a final boss stage. Help Count Vladula jr. regain the respect of the monster community and defeat his arch-nemesis.

name: Cataclysm: Even Angels Sin
description: Breach the Sinner's Paradise as the Heaven Breaker and reclaim the divine realm.

name: Loud Run
description: "Loud Run" is a 2-12 player fun multiplayer game. The Chaser tries to catch all the Runners within the range of their voice. When the Chaser runs out of breath, it's the Runners' turn to take down the Chaser. Prepare your breath; a looooong adventure awaits you!

name: Disorder: Save Your Family
description:
Ensnared in a sinister game of life and death, a young gamer must solve a series of chilling word puzzles to rescue his family from the clutches of The Ghoul—a malevolent and infamous dark web content creator.

With each puzzle solved, the grip of terror tightens; each failure broadcasts the family's plight to an audience of miscreants on the dark web, escalating the stakes in a relentless battle against time and terror.

As players progress, they navigate a twisted narrative where their choices shape the fate of an innocent family, adding layers of suspense and moral dilemma to their harrowing journey.

name: Final Destiny
description:
Join the journey of a girl and baby looking to go beyond the end of the world.
Destroy all monsters and feel the dynamic combat system.

name: Pokemon Auto Chess
description: Pokémon Auto Chess is an auto battler fan game based on Pokémon Mystery Dungeon world!

name: Conduct Together!: Track Pack
description:
Expand your world with new exciting levels in new fun places, filled with new mechanics and conducting challenges!
The Conduct TOGETHER! Track Pack expands your Conduct-journey with 36 new levels spread across multiple familiar locales, and also the new Toy-world!

Some levels feature brand new Railway Crossings that you can activate to stop traffic. Now your trains can safely cross over busy streets!

The HQ has expanded as well! The Track Pack includes 7 new trains for you to add to your collection.

name: Conduct Together!: Track Pack 2
description:
The Conduct TOGETHER! Track Pack 2 expands and changes your conducting journey with 25 new levels spread across 5 new worlds.

Some of these levels will include new features and tracks to challenge you in different ways.

One such example is the new railway turntable that will let you rotate tracks to connect in new ways.

name: Married in Red
description: Married in Red is a short 2D RPG thriller-story game with visual novel and point-and-click elements set in South Korea that follows the story of Bok-su Go visiting her old friend from University, Da-jeong Choi, on her wedding day.

name: Arashi Gaiden
description: Arashi Gaiden is a turn-based action game, with frantic combat, in the dash-and-slash style. Arashi is a Ronin from the Pocket Bravery universe, he was hired by his former master, Lobo, receiving the mission of defeating Ninjas and Matilha soldiers to recover 3 powerful relics from Japan.

name: Asleep: Ato 2
description: Upon mysteriously waking up on the outskirts of a small village, Ana Lúcia continues her journey in search of answers in a supposedly peaceful new environment but soon experiences suspicious events forcing her to face even more intense and disturbing dangers. The nightmare continues.

name: Boomies
description:
Boomies is a 2D Roleplay/Simulation mobile game designed for kids based on characters from the Brazilian animated series WeeBoom.

Players can interact with the game's scenery and sound effects, befriend characters, and customize their Boomie using various unlockable options.

name: Jenny Lusby: Intergalactic Adventures
description:
Jenny Pitstop Lusby is an ordinary girl with a passion for spaceships until she discovers that her grandfather is a living legend of intergalactic racing. Now, under the shadow of his extraordinary legacy, Jenny is thrown into a saga full of speed and challenges, fighting to prove herself worthy of her title. As she prepares for the big race that could define her destiny, she must overcome Merak, her grandfather's cunning rival, whose mechanical traps, armies of robots, and mind-blowing super spaceships threaten to end her journey prematurely.
Navigate through otherworldly landscapes and explore exotic planets in the peculiar galaxy of Pitstop. Defeat Merak's arsenal in each endless procedural match, develop your skills, upgrade your ship, and become an unbeatable competitor in this engaging racing and shooting game. You won't want to miss out on this intergalactic showdown!

name: Deimos' Endless Pursuit of Becoming Deimos: Part One
description: Sin descripción

name: Engines of Fury
description:
A thrilling top-down extraction shooter with ARPG elements.
Humanity is forced to live underground due to a meteor impact that released a mutagenic virus, turning the flora and fauna of earth into horrifying monsters. Can you survive this post-apocalyptic PvPvE shooter?
Gather your friends and find out.

name: Cats and Mice
description: Online PvP and Battle Royal Experience with Cats and Mice characters.

name: Chili's Big Smasher BurgerTime
description: Introducing Chili’s Big Smasher BurgerTime, a refreshed version of the cult classic BurgerTime arcade game. Play as Joe Chilihead and build as many Big Smashers as possible and defeat evil fast food syndicate for the chance to win free burgers for LIFE!

name: Noroi E: Darkness
description:
In "Noroi E: Darkness", you immerse yourself in the shoes of Detective Juárez, a private detective who has been investigating paranormal cases since he was fired from the police department. One night, you receive a desperate call from a mother worried about the disappearance of her son, Oscar García, in a small, bleak town in northern Mexico called Santa Anna.

Arriving at the scene, you find a gloomy environment, decrepit buildings and an atmosphere full of mystery. Your mission is to discover what happened to Oscar and solve the dark secret behind his disappearance.

name: Polyaris
description: Polyaris is a single-player, first-person survival skiing game set in a post-nuclear, procedurally generated Arctic world. Survive the cold, ski through icy wastelands, find essential resources, fight enemies, and uncover the mystery of why you are the last one alive.

name: Quicar
description: Quicar is a game similar to the classic Pong but with a new way of playing that you will love.

name: Dungeon of Erotic Master Plus
description: This is a pseudo-3D dungeon/animation RPG. The girls hailed as the Erotic Masters after solving the mystery behind the world's toughest dungeon are now living legends. Explore the dungeons and acquire maps with these beautiful warriors and grow stronger. It's time to set off on a new adventure!

name: Crazy Climber
description: Sin descripción

name: Bugatron Worlds
description:
Hostile bugs from outer space are attacking Earth, and the only thing that can stop them is the player and their ship armed with a big arsenal of weapons and gadgets.

Bugatron Worlds is a sequel to the original Bugatron where the player once again fights the insects from outer space who want to devour Earth's population and destroy Earth. The enemies typically fly all over the screen during the gameplay and depending on the level they might shoot at the player's ship. Power-Downs are replaced with obstacles that include fans which will redirect the player's shots, and invulnerable enemies that can only be destroyed with balls/fruits (by shooting the balls/fruits to make them bounce across the battlefield and destroy all the enemies they touch).

name: Egg Fried Rice
description:
It's the middle of the night. You need to rest but your stomach is growling and
it's all you can think about. You're never going to fall asleep like this, you can't
fight it. Is there any food in the house? Something quick? Something easy?
Perhaps you will have to visit the local takeaway and order some EGG FRIED RICE...

name: Kaiketsu Zorori: Mezase! Itazura King
description:
Kaiketsu Zorori: Mezase! Itazura King is a Miscellaneous game based on the popular Japanese children's book character Kaiketsu Zorori, developed and published by Bandai. Released exclusively in Japan in 2004.
Using the EyeToy camera, you can put yourself in the game and appear alongside Zorori, Ishishi and friends. There are nine different types of mischief you can cause -- the ultimate objective is to outdo Zorori himself. There is also a party mode where up to four players compete consecutively to become the King of Pranks.

name: Shattered Fate
description:
Embark on a journey of discovery through a medieval world that was shattered by a mystical event in this Souls Like game!

In the world of Albion, you will control Leif, a young man trying to find his destiny, casted on a decrypt and corrupted world, he will have to battle against evil forces, discover his fate and try to heal the world from Chaos.

name: Chernograd
description:
Chernograd is a story-driven simulation game with multiple endings based on the player's decisions.

The player takes on the role of an employee of the Citizen Tranquility Agency, monitoring the residents of the 15th district of Chernograd. Each apartment is equipped with a system that tracks citizen activities, and any detected violations allow the player to connect to the home and apartment using video and audio recorders to find the violator, compile a report, and send it to the Department of Truth Inquiry along with all the evidence.

name: Love Kira
description: Love Kira is an upcoming visual novel inspired by the independent VTuber group Kira Kara, filled with drama, romance, and lots of comedy with the talented "Kiras" from the esteemed Kara Talent Academy.

name: Gacha Life 2
description:
The sequel to your favorite dress-up game is finally here! Create your own anime styled characters and dress them up in your favorite fashion outfits! With more customization than ever, you can create any character that you can imagine!

Choose from thousands of dresses, shirts, hairstyles, weapons, and much more! After designing your characters, enter the Studio and create your own scenes and stories! Select from a hundred backgrounds to create the perfect story!

name: Anime Gacha!
description: Anime Gacha is a 100% free gacha simulator that lets you pull characters as many times as you want! Collect 180 anime-styled characters and level them up by pulling duplicates of them. You can form a party of five characters and battle Raid Bosses! Compete with your friends and other players in many different leaderboards! Start your rolling today and form the ultimate team!

name: All Alone
description: Sin descripción

name: AllFive Classic
description: Sin descripción

name: Sniper Elite 5: Airborne Elite Weapon & Skin Pack
description: It’s Rebellion's 30th birthday and to celebrate we are giving you the Airborne Elite Pack for free. It gives you access to the stunning Lee No.4 rifle, an iconic Parachute Regiment Character Skin for Karl and a Union Jack Weapon Skin for the Welrod pistol.

name: Sniper Elite 5: Valentine's Weapon Skin Pack
description: Celebrate Valentine’s Day by giving your M1911 the look of love with this free Cherry Hunter Weapon Skin. Download now for FREE to share the love.

name: AllFive XP
description: Sin descripción

name: Sniper Elite 5: Winter Weapons Skin Pack
description: Go frosty with the new FREE Winter Weapons Skin Pack for Sniper Elite 5. This free pack gives you the option to apply an Arctic paint scheme to all your in-game weapons, giving them a distinct winter camouflage look. Your enemies will be frozen with fear, that’s if they even see you coming!

name: Sniper Elite 5: Up Close and Personal Weapon & Skin Pack
description:
Prepare for close confrontation with a new character look and bolstered artillery of heavy fire weapons.

Equip the Win & Co 1885, a heavy-hitting rifle that despite its restricted rate of fire, houses an enormous .50 calibre 50-110 round, capable of eliminating any enemy in its path with a single shot.

Complimenting the Win & Co 1885 is the ERMA.36, a submachine gun that features an integral suppressor and high muzzle velocity, making for a heavy but powerful stealth SMG.

Available in both Karl and Monika variants, the Tank Top Character Skin features brown leather accents and a rough and ready combat look for traversing the battlefield.

name: Sniper Elite 5: Trench Warfare Weapon Pack
description:
This FREE Weapons Pack gives you some devastating firepower perfect for close quarters combat in the shape of the Carl Gustav M/1945 SMG, the Trench Gun and a Double 1866 pistol.

The Carl Gustav M/1945, better known as the Swedish K, was adopted in 1945, taking features from various WWII firearms to produce a reliable and well-balanced sub-machine gun. Firing at 600 rounds-per-minute, the Gustav provides accurate single shots, whilst also offering great control in continuous fire.

A powerful pump-action shotgun, the Trench Gun first saw use by US Forces during World Wars I & II. Fed with 12-gauge shells from its 6-round tube magazine, it sacrifices range and fire rate for extreme damage in close quarters.

The Double 1866 is a double-barrel pocket pistol designed in the 19th Century as an easily concealable backup gun that can be drawn at speed. Despite only featuring a single-action trigger and producing a very low muzzle velocity, the D.1866's unique traits make for a powerful weapon at close range.

name: Sniper Elite 5: Death From Above Weapon and Skin Pack
description:
Death From Above is the second content pack in Season Pass Two bringing a new rifle in the shape of the Pedersen, a weapon skin and two character skins.

The Pedersen rifle was proposed as part of a program to adopt a semi-automatic replacement to the M1903. It features no scope options but is arguably best-in-class for ironsight usage and is capable of firing fast, accurate shots at medium range, with great overall stability.

You will also receive the striking British Dazzle weapon skin, available for all weapons, pays homage to the dazzle camouflage design used on British tanks during desert campaigns.

Finally, both Karl and Monika receive new character skins. The British Bomber skin for Karl gives him a distinct aviator look while the Air Auxiliary skin for Monika reflects the uniforms worn by the women’s air-corps whose job was to transport new or repaired planes to active military airfields throughout the UK.

name: Sniper Elite 5: Saboteur Weapon and Skin Pack
description:
Two new weapons and a Liberator character skin for Karl await in the latest content drop from Season Pass Two.

Both the Grease Gun and TERA rifle are now available as part of your arsenal. The TERA is a lightweight adaptation of the Type 38 that was originally designed for Japanese Paratroopers, this rifle is incredibly fast to equip and aim down the sight. With low levels of recoil, it provides both accuracy and a rapid rate of fire in the right hands.

Designed to be a light, reliable and mass-produced weapon, the Grease Gun is an SMG with great mobility that is very easy to control, even under sustained firing, thanks to its low rate of fire and recoil. Despite its low muzzle velocity, the stability and control on offer make it a solid choice for slightly longer ranged combat encounters.

Finally, the Liberator Skin celebrates the liberation of Paris. Karl can now sport a classic French Resistance appearance complete with signature armband.

name: Sniper Elite 5: P.1938 Suppressed Pistol
description:
Equipped with the P.1938 Suppressed Pistol, you’ll gain the advantage of being able to quickly eliminate your enemies one-by-one with barely a sound to alert the rest of the squadron.

Originally an Axis Special Forces experimental prototype, in the hands of elite sniper Karl Fairburne, this weapon has just become even more deadly.

name: Miss Mantis
description: It is a female-perspective romance visual novel, in which you will play a marriage fraudster who is trapped between three different men, and it's up to you to decide whether you want to put your interests first or fall in love.

name: Pokémon Ashen Frost
description: Pokémon Ashen Frost, formerly Pokémon Present, revolves around Sylvester, a kind, albeit surly, officer-turned-detective in Riverview City. Sylvester works alongside his not-quite-canine unit, Swinub, to solve minor cases. Tracking down missing cheques and ice sculpture vandals doesn't come without risks, however; the frigid metropolis is home to ordinary people and criminals alike. To uncover the truth, Sylvester steps on the toes of some of the city's most important figureheads... as well as the mafia's.

name: LineWay
description: LineWay is a concise style and easy-to-handle puzzle game, its goal is to connect all bricks into one line, and based on that, there are many different functional bricks to form varied challenging game levels.

name: Vnm
description: Sin descripción

name: Un-Matching Game
description: I'll show you four words. Find the one that doesn't match.

name: Run Tom Hanks Run
description: It's a classic style 2D Platformer featuring 9 levels in 3 worlds! Take to Castaway Beach, Take to the trees in Vietnam! And Meet a Volcano!

name: Hamster
description: Hamster is an idle clicker game in which you click a Hamster to make him shiver. Each click has a random chance to make him shake a little more, or a little less. Can you make him go crazy?

name: Beyond Castle Wolfenstein
description: The Commodore 64 port features an intro splash screen and introductory text before the games starts. The enemy soldiers and player sprites among others have a simpler design to make it more clear. The castle layout is also very different.

name: Arcane TD
description: A maze building fantasy tower defense game.

name: (A)woken
description:
Alpha prototype of a mecha first person shooter made in godot.
It features hand drawn anime style character sprites, an endless arcade mode and a single player story mode.

name: Timmy the Dream Hunter
description: Timmy the Dream Hunter is an interactive storybook which follows the kid Timmy and how he manages overcome his fear of the night. Each of the 15 panels is introduced with a narration and afterwards the player can click on items or persons to trigger animations. Each panel also holds a simple hidden mini game, e.g. matching the arm positions of a goblin or drawing a star constellation by clicking on spots in the given order.

name: The Peacekeeper
description:
In a distant-near future where Global Peace is attained, perceptions of reality can become muddled.
Berzerk Studio presents their rendition of a peaceful utopia; play as the Peacekeeper and promote peace and morality through any mean necessary.

name: Tom Clancy's Ghost Recon: Island Thunder
description: Ghost Recon takes the next step in battlefield realism with Tom Clancy's Ghost Recon: Island Thunder.

name: Fate/Stay Night: First Press Limited Edition
description: The first release of Fate/Stay Night, released at a limited number, came with an alternate designed box & an a 100 page art & info booklet called the Side Material.

name: Bomb Bowling
description: Kick the pins out of the screen using explosions. We call this a Bomb Bowling!

name: Yoiyami Biscuit
description: Sin descripción

name: Jumpy Bunny
description: Obey the carrots and accept the challenging levels with a silly Bunny! Jump, jump, and jump. This game is about jumping with precision and determination.

name: Eggular Game
description: In this game you are an egg and you need to find a ridiculous amount of ham. Explore the strange world, encounter the bizarre inhabitants, dodge pizza, summon hippos and explore everywhere to find all the hams! Be sure to be thorough and get home in time for dinner with the King! You don't want to disappoint him...

name: Leprechaun Twins
description: A pair of cute Leprechaun Twins had their pot of gold taken by a Griffin!

name: Super Mario 64 Nintendo 3DS Port
description: A fork of Super Mario 64 Port which has enhancements over the previous Super Mario 64 3DS Port, like a touchscreen camera control in the style of Super Mario 64 DS, along with performance improvements.

name: Super Mario 64 Android Port
description: A port of Super Mario 64 for Android, fork of Super Mario 64 Port.

name: The Capitol Cheese Agreement
description:
The Capitol Food Corporation is rumoured to be adding tracking devices into their food products, transmitting surveillance data on the population on a widespread scale.

According to your clients, they are silently signing a new contract which may have devastating consequences. Your mission is to infiltrate one of their headquarters and retrieve the entirety of the contract for further investigation.

name: Super Mario 64 NX
description: A port of Super Mario 64 for 64-bit platforms, including Windows, Linux and Nintendo Switch. It has support for mods via PAK files and was based on the Super Mario 64 decompilation.

name: Super Mario 64 Port
description: An unofficial port of Super Mario 64 for the Wii U, fork of Super Mario 64 Port.

name: Super Mario 64 Port: PSP Port of PC
description: A fork of Super Mario 64 Port with support for the PSP and the Dreamcast.

name: Super Mario 64 DOS Port
description: An unofficial port of Super Mario 64 for DOS.

name: Super Mario 64 EX Alo
description: A fork of SM64EX with extra features. It also includes support for other platforms.

name: Cats Spotter
description: Welcome to "Cats Spotter"! This is a light-hearted and enjoyable casual game where your mission is to find all the hidden cats on a colorful and vibrant Meow Planet.

name: 3D Pinball: Space Cadet NDS
description: 3D Pinball: Space Cadet NDS is a mod for 3D Pinball: Space Cadet that ports the game to the Nintendo DS using the 3D Pinball: Space Cadet decompilation project.

name: Abrix 2: Diamond Version
description: Abrix 2 is an addictive puzzle game for everyone. Try over 170 different levels of puzzles and secrets and help Abrix, a tiny toy robot, to find a way out. Abrix 2 is a continuation of a hit game Abrix the robot. Now with new graphics and full of new stuff it's better than ever.

name: Haunted
description:
Embark on a spectral treasure hunt to find your long-lost sibling and save the spirit world!

Since losing her little sister Emily in a fateful train crash, Mary's nights are haunted by visions of her long-lost sister. Is it possible that Emily is still alive? The thought won't let Mary rest so she sets out in search of the truth following the signs she has seen in her nightmarish visions...

In the darkness, you are never really alone...As Mary's search plunges her ever deeper into an eerie world of the supernatural – she encounters fiendish opponents that would do her harm.
